quotes.message: Common sense is the knack of seeing things as they are, and doing things as they ought to be done.
quotes.name: Harriet Elizabeth Beecher Stowe

quotes.message: Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The philosophy of one century is the common sense of the next.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Common sense is genius dressed in its working clothes.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: I can never fear that things will go far wrong where common sense has fair play.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: The three great essentials to achieve anything worth while are, first, hard work; second, stick-to-itiveness; third, common sense.
quotes.name: Thomas A Edison

quotes.message: Science is a first-rate piece of furniture for a man's upper chamber, if he has common sense on the ground floor.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.message: The best prophet is common sense, our native wit.
quotes.name: Euripides
